DOC.brief_summary: A single- center prospective observational study . This study evaluate different aspect endothelial function . It investigate endothelial leakage venous occlusion plethysmography flow-mediated vasodilatation ischaemia reperfusion testing .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Monitoring Endothelial Dysfunction Pregnant Women Perioperative Course
DOC.criteria: Offered patient information write informed consent Female patient age great equal 18 year : 1. reduction primary ovarian tumour recidive ovarian tumour 2. pregnant patient : clinical normal pregnancy pregnancy weight gain 10 kg pregnancy gestosis 3. healthy volunteer Persons without capacity consent Unability German language use Lacking willingness save hand data within study Accommodation institution due official judicial order ( Unclear ) history alcohol substance disabuse Coworker Charit√© Advanced disease oesophagus upper respiratory tract Operation area oesophagus nasopharynx within last two month Neurological psychiatric disease CHF ( congestive heart failure ) accord ( New York Heart Association ) classification NYHA class IV begin hospital stay American Society Anaesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification great IV Renal insufficiency ( dependency haemodialysis ) Pulmonal oedema thorax xray History intracranial hemorrhage within one year participation study Conditions follow venous thrombosis within last three year study inclusion Inflammatory reflective disease blood vessel ( RaynaudSyndrome , Vasculitis ) Inherent connective tissue disease ( e.g . Marfan Syndrome )
